properties.description: Extracts data Yardi require to csv files for a single home

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT
    AmendDateTime,
    CreateDateTime,
    HOME_REF,
    OLOC_REF,
    OROOM_REF,
    ROOM_CAT,
    ROOM_CAT_DESC,
    ROOM_CODE,
    ROOM_DESC,
    ROOM_NO_BEDS,
    ROOM_REF,
    ROOM_TYPE,
    ROOM_TYPE_DESC,
    CHARGEPERIOD,
    CURRENTRATE,
    RATEDATE,
    ROOM_UDF1,
    ROOM_UDF2,
    ROOM_UDF3,
    ROOM_UDF4,
    USEFLAG
FROM 
    dbo.ROOMS
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
SELECT TOP 1 HomeName FROM Avery.HOME WHERE ColdHarbourHOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'

SELECT 
    ADANAL_DEC
    ,ADDRESS1
    ,ADDRESS2
    ,ADDRESS3
    ,ADDRESS4
    ,ADMSN_ANAL
    ,ADMSN_TYPE
    ,ADM_REASON
    ,ADTYP_DEC
    ,ANAL_GROUP
    ,AUTHORITY
    ,AmendDateTime
    ,BIRTHDATE
    ,CARECAT
    ,CONTSIGNED
    ,CreateDateTime
    ,DISABILITY
    ,ENQ_REF
    ,HOME
    ,HOME_REF
    ,LASTADDATE
    ,LASTDIDATE
    ,LOC_DESC
    ,LOC_REF
    ,MARKETING
    ,NINUMBER
    ,OCC_IGNORE
    ,ORES_REF
    ,ORIGADDATE
    ,POSTCODE
    ,RELIGION
    ,RESPAYINT
    ,RES_CODE
    --,RES_FNAME
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('&', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		WHEN CHARINDEX('-', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN RES_FNAME
		ELSE (SUBSTRING(RES_FNAME, 1, CHARINDEX(' ', RES_FNAME + ' ')))
	END AS RES_FNAME
    ,RES_REF
    ,RES_SNAME
    ,ROOM
    ,ROOMCAT
    ,ROOM_DESC
    ,ROOM_TYPE
    ,SEX
    ,STATUS
    ,TEL_NO1
    ,TEL_NO2
    ,TITLE
    ,USERDEF
    ,AUTHCODE
    ,DOUBLEINS
    ,FIRSTAWARE
    ,FIRSTVISIT
    ,REAL_FNAME
    ,REAL_SNAME
    ,REAL_TITLE
    ,SIGIND
    ,THIRDPARTY
    ,USERFIELD1
    ,USERFIELD2
    ,USERFIELD3
    ,NHSNUMBER
    ,ALTCOMMS
    ,ALTCOMMS_REF
    ,ASS_ACTBY
    ,ASS_ACTBY_REF
    ,ASS_ACTDT
    ,CONNECTION
    ,CONNECTIONDET
    ,CONNECTION_REF
    ,FUNDERREF
    ,LANGUAGE
    ,LANGUAGE_REF
    ,MOVEDINFROM
    ,MOVEDINFROM_REF
    ,PATIENTREF
    ,PICID
    ,PREVCODE
	,CASE 
		WHEN CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('"',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('"', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('(',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX(')', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('(', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		WHEN CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) > 0 THEN
			LTRIM(SUBSTRING(
				RES_FNAME, 
				CHARINDEX('''',RES_FNAME, 1) + 1,
				CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME, CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) + 1) - CHARINDEX('''', RES_FNAME) - 1))
		ELSE ''
	END AS Preferred_Name
FROM 
    dbo.RESIDENT
WHERE
    HOME_REF = '@{variables('Home_Ref')}'
